title: Vanquish
notes:
Works fine with Xbox One Controller but no mouse control constantly aims up and holds fire button down (disconnecting the mouse allowed me to play with controller).
Options also only show 60hz for refresh rate but monitor did not switch to 60hz mode and was running at 144hz (vsync off).

title: Vanquish
notes: real performance is hard to determine on my Thinkpad. But it looks like it could run fine.

title: Vanquish
notes: Works great. Played a decent portion of the game without issue.

title: Vanquish
notes: game seems to get messed up if you have ANYTHING the system can even accidentally interpret as a game controller. Mouse button will get stuck firing and you cant move the mouse unless you're holding another key. unplug any controllers you have, or in my case a graphics(drawing) tablet to remove the issue.

title: Vanquish
notes: Work flawlessly, with Xbox controller. Only problem is you can't change refresh rate, it's locked on 60hz.

title: Vanquish
notes: Perfect out of the box. I notice a ~20% performance hit, but the game is still perfectly playable.
